text: Pascal Jardin is a French director in animation, He directed many Marathon Media series and movies such as Totally Spies! (season 3-5 co-directed with Stephane Berry and directed season 6) and Gormiti: The Lords of Nature Return!. In 2009, he directed Totally Spies! The Movie. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:French movie directors
title: Pascal Jardin
